promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic wolf steel-type pokemon wearing a metallic crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Deserthane, a a gigantic basic wolf steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Hard Face, Scrunch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "steel" or "Deserthane". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, wolf-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Found in arid terrains, this colossal canine has an iron-strong visage. Employing its unique Scrunch ability, Deserthane toughens up to survive.
